description: This small restaurant is perfect for anyone keen on fish prepared simply with a personal touch – and with the added bonus of providing good value for money. The restaurant belongs to the AIC network (Italian Association for Coeliacs) and therefore offers a good selection of gluten - free dishes, including bread and pasta.
